ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Corporate_Partnership', ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( StageName ) , 'Negotiate'), NOT( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Proposal') ), NOT( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Discontinued') ) )
